content.raw:
I believe leader boards were automatically generated for all environments available for competitors to submit against.

‌

Strictly speaking, the leader board for environments that competitors have access to should be considered for-fun given that you can locally access those environments and it is possible to hard-code a scenario in to achieve a score much higher than your autonomy is capable of achieving in an unknown environment.
content.html:
I believe leader boards were automatically generated for all environments available for competitors to submit against.

‌

Strictly speaking, the leader board for environments that competitors have access to should be considered for-fun given that you can locally access those environments and it is possible to hard-code a scenario in to achieve a score much higher than your autonomy is capable of achieving in an unknown environment.
